SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientAbstract
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.client.Client
public class Client extends ClientAbstract
This class represents a client in the network communication via socket. It is responsible for sending and receiving messages to/from the server. It also manages the user interface strategy (CLI or GUI).

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(String arg, String usernameask) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Starts the client and establishes a connection with the server. It also handles the user's choice to join or create a game session.
      Parameters:
      arg - The argument to determine if the client is reconnecting.
      usernameask - The username of the client.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error in the input or output stream.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of a serialized object cannot be found.

    • restart

      public static void restart(String bool, String usernameask, String ip)
      Restarts the client.
      Parameters:
      bool - The boolean value to determine if the client is reconnecting.
      usernameask - The username of the client.
      ip - The IP address of the server.
